system.description: Your knowledge of explosives allows you to modify grenades, missiles, and other explosive devices for increased effectiveness.
system.benefit: When preparing a Grenade, Missile or Round with the Explosive or Smoke Quality, they can make a +0 Tech-Use Test using the Demolitions Special Use. If they succeed they increase the Damage (if it would do damage) and Blast Radius by 1, +1 per Three Degrees of Success beyond the first. If test is failed by more Degrees of Failure than their Intelligence Bonus, they accidentally trigger the device and it detonates immediately.

rollConfig.description: Tech-Use (Demolitions) Test to modify explosive payload

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Explosives
specialAbilities.description: Make a Tech-Use Test to modify explosives. Success: +1 Damage and Blast Radius (+1 per 3 DoS). Failure by more than IB: device detonates immediately.
